title: An investigator-initiated open-label clinical trial of vismodegib as a neoadjuvant to surgery for high-risk basal cell carcinoma.
venue: Journal of American Academy of Dermatology

tldr.text: Neoadjuvant vismodegib appears to reduce surgical defect area when taken for 3 months or longer for nonrecurrent BCCs in functionally sensitive locations, and this was an open-label, single-arm intervention trial.
